at.nineyards.anyline.camera

Class CutoutView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • at.nineyards.anyline.camera.CutoutView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback

    public class CutoutView
extends android.view.View
    A view that can have a background and cut out of it a transparent area in which a rect or drawable can be drawn. This is useful to overlay onto a camera preview to put the emphasis on a special area.

    • Method Detail

      • setRect

        public void setRect(android.graphics.RectF rect,
                    int strokeColor,
                    int strokeWidthInDp,
                    int cornerRadiusInDp)
        Set the cutout to be a rect with the given characteristics.
        Parameters:
        rect - the bounds (to cut out off the background und to draw the rect)
        strokeColor - the stroke color
        strokeWidthInDp - the stroke width in dp
        cornerRadiusInDp - the corner radius in dp

      • setDrawable

        public void setDrawable(@DrawableRes
                        int drawableId,
                        android.graphics.RectF bounds)
        Set the cutout to be a drawable.
        Parameters:
        drawableId - the resource identifier for the drawable to use
        bounds - the bounds (where the background will be cut out and the drawable will be drawn)

      • setDrawable

        public void setDrawable(android.graphics.drawable.Drawable drawable,
                        android.graphics.RectF rect)
        Set the cutout to be a drawable.
        Parameters:
        drawable - the drawable to draw inside the given bounds
        rect - the bounds (where the background will be cut out and the drawable will be drawn)

      • setBackgroundColor

        public void setBackgroundColor(int backgroundColor)
        Set the background color (The color outside of the cutout area). The color should usually have a transparency.
        Overrides:
        setBackgroundColor in class android.view.View
        Parameters:
        backgroundColor - the background color to set
